name: Escape Plan: Add-On Bundle
summary:
Cut! That’s a wrap. We present to you the Escape Plan Director’s Cut DLC. Work your way through the most evil, heart-wrenching, explosive levels the designers of Escape Plan ever conceived.

The Asylum picks up right where Lil and Laarg left off at the end of Escape Plan™. Traversing through a sewer pipe, Lil and Laarg accidentally find themselves in a psycho ward full of Bakuki's failed experiments.

Free from the Asylum and delivered fresh from crazy town, Lil and Laarg discover an underground railway. Could this be their ticket home? Pick up this treacherous new DLC pack to discover an entirely new labyrinth of 19 puzzles and death traps.

For one price, get this add-on on PS4™ and PlayStation®Vita systems. Purchase it on your PS Vita system and it will automatically appear for download on your PS4™ and PS3™ systems at no additional cost.
